{{Infobox Network Adapter |image1 = |image1_size = |caption = AC600 Dual-Band MU-MIMO WiFi USB Adapter |caption2 = |pp = |sp = http://support.linksys.com/us/support-product?pid=01t34000003wEFlAAM |dl = |wikidevi = |wikipedia = |brand = Linksys |model = WUSB6100M |submodelappend = |submodel = |revision = v1 |subrevision = |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 08/25/2016 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/Linksys_WUSB6100M |sernum = |wlclass = AC600 |series = |if = USB |if_bus_version = 2.0 |ifconnector = Male A |formfactor = mini dongle |vendor_id = 13b1 |device_id = 0042 |subvendor_id = |subdevice_id = |id_string = |windosid = |fcc_id = Q87-WUSB6100M |icid = 3839A-WUSB6100 |boardid = |ecc_id = |oui = 24:F5:A2 |chip1 = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA9377; |chip2 = |chip3 = |chip4 = |antconn = |antenna = |txchains = 1 |rxchains = 1 |sstreams = 1 |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n/ac |802.11ac = 433 |802.11n = 150 |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |802.11a = 54 |wififreq = 2.4 or 5 |receive_sens = |transmit_power = |linuxdriv = |windriv = |is_manuf = No |manuf = |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |addchip = |flags = MU-MIMO, DFS |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac |accessible_UART = No |accessible_JTAG = |category = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 04/22/2016 |estreldate = 01/2016 |estprice = 49.99 |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = N82E16833124609 |asin = B01DT48WRQ |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China |powledcolor = |connactled = |spdledcolor = |leddupcolor = |dimmin = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== === Linux support === QCA9377 USB support would appear to be in-kernel for [[ath10k]]. :Whether or not it actually works (reliably or reasonably) for this dongle is questionable. The driver itself warns - '''WARNING: ath10k USB support is incomplete, don't expect anything to work!'''. :At a bare minimum, you will need the firmware and board data for this specific device. For more information, see [https://www.spinics.net/lists/linux-wireless/msg158150.html This LWML post], which is the (RFC) patch adding USB support to [[ath10k]] :(tested specifically with a WUSB6100M) which links to [https://github.com/erstrom/ath10k-firmware/tree/usb/QCA9377/hw1.0 GitHub repository] with firmware dumps. ==Links of Interest== *[https://openitforum.pl/gallery/album/215-linksys-wusb6100m/ ''Linksys WUSB6100M'' photos on '''OpenITforum'''] ===Forum threads=== *[http://askubuntu.com/questions/799104/linksys-wusb6100m ''Linksys WUSB6100M'' on '''AskUbuntu''' forums]

===News=== *[http://www.linksys.com/us/pressreleases/linksys-highlights-new-mu-mimo-routers/ ''Linksys Introduces the Largest Portfolio of MU-MIMO Home Networking Solutions
– the Next Generation of Wi-Fi'' PR on '''Linksys'''] *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/other/ces/ces-2016/32917-linksys-ces-2016-announcements ''Linksys CES 2016 Announcements'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] :*[[Linksys EA9500]] - AC5400 Tri-Band Wi-Fi Router with 4x4 MU-MIMO (Wave 2) ::[[Broadcom]] @1.4GHz dual-core CPU, 1x WAN/8x LAN GbE, USB 2.0/3.0 :*[[Linksys EA7500]] - AC1900 Dual-Band MU-MIMO Gigabit Router (Wave 2) ::[[Qualcomm]] IPQ @1.4GHz dual-core CPU, 1x WAN/4x LAN GbE, USB 2.0/3.0 :*[[Linksys CG7500]] - High Speed AC1900 Dual-Band Cable Modem Router ::@1.2GHz dual-core CPU, 4x GbE LAN, USB 2.0, 24x8 DOCSIS 3.0 (100 Mbps+) :*[[Netgear EX7300]] - AC2200 MU-MIMO Wi-Fi Range Extender ::4x4 MU-MIMO AC1750 (5GHz), 3x3 N450 (2.4GHz) :*[[Linksys RE7000]] - AC1900+ MU-MIMO Wi-Fi Range Extender ::4x4 MU-MIMO AC1750 (5GHz), 2x2 N300 (2.4GHz) :*[[Linksys X6200]] - ADSL/VDSL AC750 Dual-Band Wi-Fi Modem Router ::VDSL/ADSL2/2+ Annex A, 1x WAN/4x LAN GbE, VDSL/ADSL2+ Annex A,B,L,M :*[[Linksys WUSB6100M]] - AC600 MU-MIMO USB 2.0 Adapter ::1x1 MU-MIMO AC450 (5GHz), 1x1 N150 (2.4GHz), USB 2.0 ==See also== :https://usb-ids.gowdy.us/read/UD/13b1 :http://listing.driveragent.com/c/usb/13b1/ *[[Linksys AE1000]] - 13b1:002f *[[Linksys AE1200]] - 13b1:0039 *[[Linksys AE2500]] - 13b1:003a *[[Linksys AE3000]] - 13b1:003b *[[Linksys AE6000]] - 13b1:003e *[[Linksys WUSB6100M]] - 13b1:0042 *[[Linksys WUSB6300]] - 13b1:003f *[[Linksys WUSB6300 v2]] - 13b1:0045 :802.11ac Wireless Adapter [Realtek RTL8822BU] (AC1200) :FCC ID: K7S-03609 (2020-11-17) • WUBT-236AC73 (US/CA) *[[Linksys WUSB6400M]] - 13b1:0043 *[[Linksys USB3GIG]] - 13b1:0041 (RTL) *[[Linksys USB300M]] v1 - 0b95:7720 (ASIX) [[Category:English Documentation]]
